data.text: @StLCountyDOH Knowing nothing significant has taken place to change it, I’ll just chuckle knowing y’all were fake AF, and the rest of us were right
@StLCountyDOH You mean the illegal one that no one followed? Didn't you get the polling memo? COVID is over until the Midterm Variant.

@LandofbillyV @RinchenUker @StLCountyDOH They liked the part where they got to force others to wear a mask and take vaccines against their will. It was a bright flash of relevance and power in their otherwise pathetic and meaningless life.
@RinchenUker @StLCountyDOH Take the mask off, let the oxygen reach your brain!
@StLCountyDOH Yah we're all about a year ahead of you on this one.
@RinchenUker @StLCountyDOH No one said you can’t wear a mask!
Please read the full advisory here: https://t.co/dU88Q0EZtH

DPH highly recommends that residents use multiple prevention methods to protect themselves, their loved ones, and the community at large, including those at high risk of severe illness. Please note that masks are still required in all DPH facilities.

A sharp decrease in cases and hospitalizations has prompted this shift. Although the order is no longer in effect, DPH still recommends that members of the public wear a face covering in public indoor spaces.
